title: section 25(1) of the Statistics Act 1993 (No. 21 of 1993) and, other than in
heading: 1. (1) This Order may be cited as the Statistics (Retail Sales Inquiry) (No.
text_raw:
1. (1) This Order may be cited as the Statistics (Retail Sales Inquiry) (No. 

2) Order 2023. 

(2) This Order shall come into operation on 1 January 2024.
text_norm: 1 (1) order may cited statistic (retail sale inquiry) (no 2) order 2023 (2) order shall come operation 1 january 2024

title: section 25(1) of the Statistics Act 1993 (No. 21 of 1993) and, other than in
heading: 2. (1) In this Order -
text_raw:
2. (1) In this Order - 

“inquiry” means the Retail Sales Inquiry that is conducted by the Central 
Statistics Office for the purposes of obtaining information specified in the 
Schedule, including for the purposes of compliance with the Regulation in so 
far as it relates to Article 4 and paragraphs (1)(a) and (2)(i) of Article 6 thereto; 

“Regulation” means Regulation (EU) 2019/2152 of the European Parliament 
and of the Council of 27 November 2019,1 as amended by Commission 
Delegated Regulation (EU) 2021/1704 of 14 July 2021;3 

“relevant period” means the period from 1 February 2024 to 31 December
text_norm: 2 (1) order - inquiry mean retail sale inquiry conducted central statistic office purpose obtaining information specified schedule including purpose compliance regulation far relates article 4 paragraph (1)(a) (2)(i) article 6 thereto regulation mean regulation (eu) 2019 2152 european parliament council 27 november 2019 1 amended commission delegated regulation (eu) 2021 1704 14 july 2021 3 relevant period mean period 1 february 2024 31 december

title: section 25(1) of the Statistics Act 1993 (No. 21 of 1993) and, other than in
heading: (2) A word or expression that is used in this Order and also used in the
text_raw:
2028. 

(2) A word or expression that is used in this Order and also used in the 
Regulation has the same meaning in this Order as in the Regulation, other than 
where the context otherwise requires.
text_norm: 2028 (2) word expression used order also used regulation meaning order regulation context otherwise requires

title: section 25(1) of the Statistics Act 1993 (No. 21 of 1993) and, other than in
heading: 3. This Order applies to a person who, or an undertaking that, is classified
text_raw:
3. This Order applies to a person who, or an undertaking that, is classified 
for statistical purposes under division 47 or 45 or class 56.30 of NACE Rev. 2 
set out in Annex I to Regulation (EC) No.1893/2006 of the European 
Parliament and of the Council of 20 December 20063, as amended by 
Regulation (EC) No. 295/2008 of the European Parliament and of the Council 
of 11 March 20084, Regulation (EU) No. 70/2012 of the European Parliament 

1 OJ No. L 327, 17.12.2019, p. 1 
2 OJ No. L 339, 24.9.2023, p. 33 
3 OJ No. L 393, 30.12.2006, p. 1 
4 OJ No. L 97, 9.4.2008, p. 13 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 27th October, 2023. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [511] 3 

and of the Council of 18 January 20125, and Regulation (EU) 2019/1243 of the 
European Parliament and of the Council of 20 June 2019.6

title: section 25(1) of the Statistics Act 1993 (No. 21 of 1993) and, other than in
heading: 4. A requirement on persons or undertakings to which this Order applies
text_raw:
4. A requirement on persons or undertakings to which this Order applies 
to provide, for the purposes of the inquiry, information the general nature of 
which is specified in the Schedule, monthly in the relevant period in relation to 
the immediately preceding month, is hereby prescribed. 

5 OJ No. L 32, 3.2.2012, p. 1 
6 OJ No. L 198, 25.7.2019, p. 241 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [511]

title: section 25(1) of the Statistics Act 1993 (No. 21 of 1993) and, other than in
heading: Article 4

title: section 25(1) of the Statistics Act 1993 (No. 21 of 1993) and, other than in
heading: Information, regarding the following, as it relates to the person or
text_raw:
1. 

Information, regarding the following, as it relates to the person or 
undertaking concerned, and specifying the monthly period to which the 
information relates: 

(a) 

(b) 

(c) 

the total value, including VAT, of retail sales; 

the total value, including VAT, of retail sales where the sales 
were via the internet; 

the number of outlets through which the retail sales referred to 
in subparagraph (a) were made.
text_norm: 1 information regarding following relates person undertaking concerned specifying monthly period information relates (a) (b) (c) total value including vat retail sale total value including vat retail sale sale via internet number outlet retail sale referred subparagraph (a) made

title: section 25(1) of the Statistics Act 1993 (No. 21 of 1993) and, other than in
heading: Information on the time taken by the person or undertaking concerned
text_raw:
2. 

Information on the time taken by the person or undertaking concerned 
to complete the questionnaire, form or other record prepared by the Director 
General for the collection of the information referred to in paragraph 1. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

24 October, 2023. 

LEO VARADKAR, 

Taoiseach.
